chapter.title: The OFX Image Effect Plug-in API
chapter.para: The OFX Image Effect Plug-in API is built on top of the core OFX plug-in API. It consists of a set of actions, suites, object handles and properties that allow a host and a plug-in to communicate so that images can be processed.

section.title: Suites Used by The Image Effects API
section.para:
The following suites are used by the Image Effects API...
the property suite for basic property operations, the image effect Suite for image effect specific functions, the memory suite for memory allocation, the parameter suite for creating and manipulating user visible parameters, the multithreading suite for simple SMP processing, the interact suite to allow a plugin to draw custom widgets and controls, the message suite to allow a plugin to send messages to a user, the time line suite that allows a plugin to manipulate an effects timeline, the progress suite to allow a plugin to provide feeback for the progress of a slow effect.
